The Kanye Western Conference-leading Lakers earned their fourth straight victory to pull within a game of NBA-leading Cleveland, and five in a row on the road for a league-high 26 this season. One of our goals is to have the best record before the playoffs start to have home-court advantage, Lamar Odom acknowledged. At this point, the once-mighty Pistons simply are hoping to make the playoffs. They were without Allen Iverson ( back), Richard Hamilton ( groin) and Rasheed Wallace ( calf) against the Lakers.``

last few years- and it certainly has- much of blame falls on Eric Schmidt . His haughty, creepy, and occasionally insulting way of addressing the company's approach to privacy is href="http://www.theregister.co.uk/2010/10/25/Eric Schmidt_on_street_view/"> notorious. Google policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, he once said, unwittingly showing that Google's policy is just the opposite. His efforts to paint such comments as humor only made the situation worse. The irony is that when he steps down as CEO

NFL commissioner Roger Goodell , in his annual Super Bowl Friday news conference, largely given to labor issues, was obliged to explain that Michael Vick had told him people used his name without his permission for events.

Richard Lugar Prather, a retired auto worker from Anderson, said after the Pendleton town hall that he believed Mike Pence 's reputation as a federal spending hawk would serve him well running for the governor's office. I think he would have been a good candidate for president, but I'm glad he didn't, Prather said.`` In the next race, he can run for president.''

' A promise kept'`` Some in the cynical political class are saying this is a gimmick, an empty gesture,'' said Indiana Rep. Mike Pence , a possible Republican presidential candidate. We on the other side call it a promise kept. That refrain was repeated by Republicans often during the House debate.
